content.plan:
1. Navigate to https://www.wrangler.in/ and wait for the homepage to fully load. Verify expected visual signals for the homepage.
2. Close any promotional popup or banner if present.
3. Click the search icon or focus the search input field.
4. Type "solid blue shirt" into the search field and submit the query.
5. Verify that the search results page displays matching products, including a solid blue shirt.
6. Click on the first matching solid blue shirt product.
7. Verify that the product detail page shows size options including XL.
8. Check if size "XL" is available.
9. Select size "XL".
10. Click the "Add to Cart" button.
11. Verify that a success indication appears confirming the item was added to the cart.
12. Navigate to the cart page.
13. Verify that the cart displays the solid blue shirt with size "XL" and quantity 1.
14. Assert that the cart contents match the expected product, size, and quantity.
